author: davidlt
body:
**204.0 QQH1352T** workflow in CMSSW_7_6_X IBs are failing due to
missing input files. It is looking for

```
/RelValQQH1352T/CMSSW_7_1_0_pre7-PRE_STA71_V3-v1/GEN-SIM
```

which is not available, but the following is:

```
/RelValQQH1352T_Tauola/CMSSW_7_1_0_pre7-PRE_STA71_V3-v1/GEN-SIM
```

I assume that a typo was made while adding `QQH1352TINPUT`.

Could someone verify this?

I am launching Jenkins tests with 204.0 included.

Signed-off-by: David Abdurachmanov David.Abdurachmanov@cern.ch
title: QQH1352TINPUT: '/RelValQQH1352T/' --> '/RelValQQH1352T_Tauola/'
